attributes.action: Ban all Loyalist Sectarian Flute bands from parading through the streets of the North of Ireland
attributes.additional_details: These bands just wind up tensions and just insults members if the catholic community. You just have to look at this to see the sectarian motives of these bands http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/northern_ireland/  . No way they should be allowed to legally walked round the streets to insult and endanger lives.
